articles.title: Nanjiamma: 62-year-old tribal who won National Award for Best Female Playback Singer
articles.description: The 62-year-old Nanjiamma, a tribal singer from Kerala won the Best Female Playback Singe at the 68th National Film Awards.
articles.content: She won the hearts of millions of Malayali filmlovers with just one song: 'Kalakkatha Sandhana from the action entertainer Ayyappanum Koshiyum. The song won Nanjiamma, a tribal singer from Attapadi i… [+1164 chars]

articles.title: No time limit drawn for appointment of chairperson, members in Law Commission, says Centre
articles.description: In a written reply, Law Minister Kiren Rijiju said the Cabinet had approved the constitution of 22nd Law Commission of India for a term of three years with effect from February 21, 2020.
